StudioConstellation is a group of architects, environment and exhibition designers. This studio was born out of a common desire to create an innovative space design, in which the relationship to art forms the basis for the architectural concept. It brings together creators with diverse and complementary backgrounds, sharing a common vision: to provide unique architectural and staging concepts, to create exclusive projects that integrate both a sense of space, a sensitive environment design, and the staging of art works.

These professionals over 20 years of experience, all experts in their field of competence, also share a vision of contemporary architecture, a dedication and a sense of details that give the projects a unique, high-value custom environment.

The business scope covers both the high-end residential projects, luxury hotels or cultural events. Projects are beyond fashion and trends, in a comprehensive and conceptual manner they include in addition to the architectural concept: the design of scenographic devices, the integration of new technologies, seamless lighting design, environmental sound design, research for custom materials and furnitures. Consulting in acquiring works of art may be added to the mission. Adding magic and value to the space will always be a goal.

Franck Vinsot - Architect & Designer # Eric Nespoulous - Architect & Designer # Jasmin Oezcebi Architect & Designer #Brifo - Sound Designer

studio@studioconstellation.com
